p: Peppermint oregano ( O. vulgare) is a popular herb in the mint family known for its important medicinal qualities. Carvacrol, the main constituent of essential oil, offered good antiviral properties against murine norovirus in an in vitro study ( 222). It also exhibited antiviral properties against HSV type-1 (HSV-1), rotavirus, and respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) ( 223).
